1.content:
Issei Hyoudou was just your average teen on the outside but on the inside he was something else. He is a High Class devil now after doing excellent in the promotion exam and a senior in Kuoh Academy. He also has so many girlfriends now that the war is over and has made many great memories with the ORC but it started to get a bit boring.

Which brings us to right now where our hero is walking back to his home with a strange black book that was titled “The Book of Reality.” Issei found this book in the bushes because he though he saw something fall from the sky and land outside. He decided to wait until after school to see what it was and luckily it was still there.

Issei went into his mansion where he saw a note on the table from his girlfriends no doubt. Dear Issei, the girls and I are having a girls night so we’ll be back in the morning. Don’t stay out or up too late you do have your finals before summer. See you to tomorrow and know that I love you. Love, Rias.

Issei smiles at the note before remembering that his summer vacation starts tomorrow and that he has one final to take but first he wants to know what the book is because of the aura it gave off.

Issei made his way up to his room and put the book on his desk before opening it to see that the pages were blank. He was surprised before flipping through the book noticing that the pages haven’t ended at all.

“Just what is this book?” Issei pondered before he felt a shock on his right hand.

“Ouch! That felt worse than Akeno’s lighting.” He yelled as he clutched his hand. Issei was about to toss the book until he saw words appearing on the page.

“Congratulations, Issei Hyoudou! You are now have the power to change reality and all you have to do is write it in the book.

Unfortunately there are a few rules you must know. No one can see what you write unless you allow them to know what you did to them. The book cannot be used by anyone else unless you allow them. The book is also indestructible so it cannot be destroyed by anything unless you write it down in the pages. Don’t believe me try writing something right now.

Issei stares at the passage before thinking it was some bull but found it interesting if he could actually change reality with this book. He decided to go ahead and do something.

‘I’m going on a date with Issei and Rias is okay with this. She must plan I’m spying on us tomorrow got to keep my guard up.’

Back to Issei, he was shocked to beyond. Realizing what he just did he felt some new power at his fingertips but realizes that he must be careful with this otherwise he would be no better than Vali’s father.
